name: v2.0.0
body:
## Using [Bzlmod] with Bazel 6 or later:

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "aspect_rules_jasmine", version = "2.0.0")
```

[Bzlmod]: https://bazel.build/build/bzlmod

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_jasmine",
    sha256 = "0d2f9c977842685895020cac721d8cc4f1b37aae15af46128cf619741dc61529",
    strip_prefix = "rules_jasmine-2.0.0",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/releases/download/v2.0.0/rules_jasmine-v2.0.0.tar.gz",
)

######################
# aspect_rules_jasmine setup #
######################
# Fetches the aspect_rules_jasmine dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.

load("@aspect_rules_jasmine//jasmine:dependencies.bzl", "rules_jasmine_dependencies")

# Fetch dependencies which users need as well
rules_jasmine_dependencies()

load("@aspect_rules_js//js:toolchains.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "rules_js_register_toolchains")

rules_js_register_toolchains(node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION)

load("@aspect_rules_js//npm:repositories.bzl", "npm_translate_lock")

npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    npmrc = "//:.npmrc",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
    verify_node_modules_ignored = "//:.bazelignore",
)

load("@npm//:repositories.bzl", "npm_repositories")

npm_repositories()
```


## What's Changed
* feat: upgrade to rules_js 2.0 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/144
* chore: bump to GHA actions/cache@v4 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/153
* chore: bump miminum dep to aspect_bazel_lib 2.7.6 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/154
* chore: bump to rules_js 2.0.0-rc1 and minimum aspect_bazel_lib 2.7.7 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/155
* chore: upgrade to Aspect Workflows 5.10.0 RC by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/156
* chore: ugprade to Aspect Workflows 5.10.0 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/157
* chore: fixup pattern for try-import of user.bazelrc by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/158
* chore: bump minimum rules_nodejs to 6.2.0 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/159
* chore: upgrade to Aspect Workflows 5.10.8 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/160
* chore: upgrade Aspect Workflows 5.10.9 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/161
* chore: upgrade to Aspect Workflows 5.10.11 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/163
* chore: upgrade to Aspect Workflows 5.10.11 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/164
* chore: upgrade to Aspect Workflows 5.10.12 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/165
* chore: upgrade to rules_js v2 by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/167


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/compare/v1.2.0...v2.0.0

name: v2.0.0-rc0
body:
> [!IMPORTANT]  
> This release requires requires rules_js 2.x. It is not compatible with rules_js 1.x. rules_js 2 is currently in RC: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/releases/tag/v2.0.0-rc0

## Using [Bzlmod] with Bazel 6 or later:

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "aspect_rules_jasmine", version = "2.0.0-rc0")
```

[Bzlmod]: https://bazel.build/build/bzlmod

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_jasmine",
    sha256 = "384bc59275ace06c27ca7f37cd7b738a4dfa633888195936d55ac376d86aebd8",
    strip_prefix = "rules_jasmine-2.0.0-rc0",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/releases/download/v2.0.0-rc0/rules_jasmine-v2.0.0-rc0.tar.gz",
)

######################
# aspect_rules_jasmine setup #
######################
# Fetches the aspect_rules_jasmine dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.

load("@aspect_rules_jasmine//jasmine:dependencies.bzl", "rules_jasmine_dependencies")

# Fetch dependencies which users need as well
rules_jasmine_dependencies()

load("@aspect_rules_js//js:toolchains.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "rules_js_register_toolchains")

rules_js_register_toolchains(node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION)

load("@aspect_rules_js//npm:repositories.bzl", "npm_translate_lock")

npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    npmrc = "//:.npmrc",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
    verify_node_modules_ignored = "//:.bazelignore",
)

load("@npm//:repositories.bzl", "npm_repositories")

npm_repositories()
```


## What's Changed
* feat: upgrade to rules_js 2.0 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/144


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/compare/v1.2.0...v2.0.0-rc0

name: v1.2.0
body:
## Using [Bzlmod] with Bazel 6 or later:

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "aspect_rules_jasmine", version = "1.2.0")
```

[Bzlmod]: https://bazel.build/build/bzlmod

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_jasmine",
    sha256 = "58f4981cd8972225bce38dcacdd897ae5ac8b41cf5968363d47b939f6c745802",
    strip_prefix = "rules_jasmine-1.2.0",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/releases/download/v1.2.0/rules_jasmine-v1.2.0.tar.gz",
)

######################
# aspect_rules_jasmine setup #
######################
# Fetches the aspect_rules_jasmine dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.

load("@aspect_rules_jasmine//jasmine:dependencies.bzl", "rules_jasmine_dependencies")

# Fetch dependencies which users need as well
rules_jasmine_dependencies()

load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

nodejs_register_toolchains(
    name = "nodejs",
    node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION,
)

load("@aspect_rules_js//npm:npm_import.bzl", "npm_translate_lock")

npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    npmrc = "//:.npmrc",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
    verify_node_modules_ignored = "//:.bazelignore",
)

load("@npm//:repositories.bzl", "npm_repositories")

npm_repositories()
```


## What's Changed
* chore: disable linux/darwin specific test on Windows by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/64
* chore: set --remote_download_minimal and --nobuild_runfile_links for all Workflows tasks by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/76
* chore: update to Bazel 6.3.2 and Aspect CLI 5.7.2 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/81
* chore: fixup warming cron --- gha does not support timezone by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/88
* chore: update buildifier targets used by Aspect Workflows by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/90
* chore: update bcr maintainers by @kormide in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/94
* chore: bring in aspect_rules_lint and add format task to Aspect Workflows by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/99
* chore: upgrade to buildifier 6.3.3 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/100
* chore: bazel run //:format by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/101
* chore: enable workflows delivery on demostration target by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/104
* chore: BCR testing on Bazel 6 and 7 by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/114
* chore: upgrade to Bazel 7.0.2 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/119
* chore: add Aspect bazelrc presets by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/121
* chore: fix GHA concurrency check to not apply to main branch by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/129
* chore: enable workflows github annotations by @kormide in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/140
* chore: bump to Bazel 7.1.1 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/148
* chore: misc cleanup by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/149
* chore: bump rules_go & gazelle deps by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/151
* chore: make e2e/jasmine_test/MODULE.bazel a real file by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/150
* chore: align ci patterns by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/152

## New Contributors
* @kormide made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/94

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/compare/v1.1.0...v1.2.0

name: v2.0.0-alpha.0
body:
> [!IMPORTANT]  
> rules_js maintainers are working towards a rules_js 2.0 RC release. Breakings changes in the underlying provider API require that all downstream rulesets have major releases such as this one. We don't recommended upgrading to this alpha release. For more information on the rules_js 2.0 release see the tracking issue https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/issues/1671.

## Using [Bzlmod] with Bazel 6 or later:

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "aspect_rules_jasmine", version = "2.0.0-alpha.0")
```

[Bzlmod]: https://bazel.build/build/bzlmod

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_jasmine",
    sha256 = "27bdef90fe30586a8a625506b1a8ce358e6c8807f46bbb8ea62c13a311ad88cc",
    strip_prefix = "rules_jasmine-2.0.0-alpha.0",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/releases/download/v2.0.0-alpha.0/rules_jasmine-v2.0.0-alpha.0.tar.gz",
)

######################
# aspect_rules_jasmine setup #
######################
# Fetches the aspect_rules_jasmine dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.

load("@aspect_rules_jasmine//jasmine:dependencies.bzl", "rules_jasmine_dependencies")

# Fetch dependencies which users need as well
rules_jasmine_dependencies()

load("@aspect_rules_js//js:toolchains.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "rules_js_register_toolchains")

rules_js_register_toolchains(node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION)

load("@aspect_rules_js//npm:repositories.bzl", "npm_translate_lock")

npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    npmrc = "//:.npmrc",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
    verify_node_modules_ignored = "//:.bazelignore",
)

load("@npm//:repositories.bzl", "npm_repositories")

npm_repositories()
```


## What's Changed
* feat: update to rules_js 1.27.0 and pickup fixed_args feature by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/58
* ci: enable buildifier check on ci by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/59
* chore: disable buildifier on windows by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/60
* chore: bump rules_js dep to 1.29.2 to pickup Windows fix by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/61
* chore: disable linux/darwin specific test on Windows by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/64
* chore: set --remote_download_minimal and --nobuild_runfile_links for all Workflows tasks by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/76
* chore: update to Bazel 6.3.2 and Aspect CLI 5.7.2 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/81
* chore: fixup warming cron --- gha does not support timezone by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/88
* chore: update buildifier targets used by Aspect Workflows by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/90
* chore: update bcr maintainers by @kormide in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/94
* chore: bring in aspect_rules_lint and add format task to Aspect Workflows by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/99
* chore: upgrade to buildifier 6.3.3 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/100
* chore: bazel run //:format by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/101
* chore: enable workflows delivery on demostration target by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/104
* chore: BCR testing on Bazel 6 and 7 by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/114
* chore: fixup GHA warming & delivery yaml by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/117
* chore: upgrade to Bazel 7.0.2 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/119
* chore: add Aspect bazelrc presets by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/121
* chore: fix GHA concurrency check to not apply to main branch by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/129
* chore: enable workflows github annotations by @kormide in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/140
* chore: bump to Bazel 7.1.1 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/148
* chore: misc cleanup by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/149
* chore: bump rules_go & gazelle deps by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/151
* chore: make e2e/jasmine_test/MODULE.bazel a real file by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/150

## New Contributors
* @kormide made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/94

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/compare/v1.0.0...v2.0.0-alpha.0

name: v1.1.1
body:
WORKSPACE snippet:
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_jasmine",
    sha256 = "4c16ef202d1e53fd880e8ecc9e0796802201ea9c89fa32f52d5d633fff858cac",
    strip_prefix = "rules_jasmine-1.1.1",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/releases/download/v1.1.1/rules_jasmine-v1.1.1.tar.gz",
)

######################
# aspect_rules_jasmine setup #
######################
# Fetches the aspect_rules_jasmine dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.

load("@aspect_rules_jasmine//jasmine:dependencies.bzl", "rules_jasmine_dependencies")

# Fetch dependencies which users need as well
rules_jasmine_dependencies()

load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

nodejs_register_toolchains(
    name = "nodejs",
    node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION,
)

load("@aspect_rules_js//npm:npm_import.bzl", "npm_translate_lock")

npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    npmrc = "//:.npmrc",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
    verify_node_modules_ignored = "//:.bazelignore",
)

load("@npm//:repositories.bzl", "npm_repositories")

npm_repositories()
```


## What's Changed
* feat: update to rules_js 1.27.0 and pickup fixed_args feature by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/58
* ci: enable buildifier check on ci by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/59
* chore: disable buildifier on windows by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/60
* chore: bump rules_js dep to 1.29.2 to pickup Windows fix by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/61


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/compare/v1.0.0...v1.1.1

name: v0.6.0
body:
WORKSPACE snippet:
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_jasmine",
    sha256 = "bb55ad9ce24a4381753f177287cffe5a0e159016012b688261bd5abc831d6ed3",
    strip_prefix = "rules_jasmine-0.6.0",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/releases/download/v0.6.0/rules_jasmine-v0.6.0.tar.gz",
)

######################
# aspect_rules_jasmine setup #
######################
# Fetches the aspect_rules_jasmine dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.

load("@aspect_rules_jasmine//jasmine:dependencies.bzl", "rules_jasmine_dependencies")

# Fetch dependencies which users need as well
rules_jasmine_dependencies()

load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

nodejs_register_toolchains(
    name = "nodejs",
    node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION,
)

load("@aspect_rules_js//npm:npm_import.bzl", "npm_translate_lock")

npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    npmrc = "//:.npmrc",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
    verify_node_modules_ignored = "//:.bazelignore",
)

load("@npm//:repositories.bzl", "npm_repositories")

npm_repositories()
```


## What's Changed
* test: add various test cases from rules_nodejs by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/49
* chore: re-use GHA workflow from rules-template by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/50
* also use reusable workflow for release by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/51
* fix: release used wrong reusable workflow by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/54
* perf: use rules_js Bazel 6 optimized fs patches if using Bazel 6 and experimental_allow_unresolved_symlinks is on by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/55

## New Contributors
* @jbedard made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/49

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/compare/v0.5.0...v0.6.0

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/compare/v0.4.0...v0.5.0

name: v0.4.0
body:
⚠️ BREAKING CHANGES ⚠️

`jasmine_repositories` repository rule is removed and a new `node_modules` attribute is now required for `jasmine_test`. This change is BREAKING for all users.

The `//path/to:node_modules` tree target must be passed to the `jasmine_test` rules via the `node_modules` attribute. For example,

```
jasmine_test(
    name = "test",
    node_modules = "//:node_modules",
    ...
)
```

You'll need `jasmine` and `jasmine-reporters` linked in the node_modules tree provided. The `jasmine-reporters` requirements can be removed by setting `generate_junit_xml = False` on your `jasmine_test` targets. `jasmine-core` is also required if you use sharding.

This change has the added benefits of not requiring users to keep the jasmine version used in their `package.json` in sync with their WORKSPACE and not requiring any changes to `rules_jasmine` to support new releases of jasmine.

This change is in the spirit of the change in rules_webpack [v0.11.0](https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/releases/tag/v0.11.0) and will also be rolled out to rules_jest, rules_rollup & rules_terser in the near future so the patterns on the downstream rules_js rulesets we maintain are aligned both for maintainers and for users.

## WORKSPACE snippet

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_jasmine",
    sha256 = "5b8a9659221f2050012fb93c230ab5a5029b0b9d8aaa63ec9f1469e82a6c977e",
    strip_prefix = "rules_jasmine-0.4.0",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/releases/download/v0.4.0/rules_jasmine-v0.4.0.tar.gz",
)

######################
# aspect_rules_jasmine setup #
######################
# Fetches the aspect_rules_jasmine dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.

load("@aspect_rules_jasmine//jasmine:dependencies.bzl", "rules_jasmine_dependencies")

# Fetch dependencies which users need as well
rules_jasmine_dependencies()

load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

nodejs_register_toolchains(
    name = "nodejs",
    node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION,
)

load("@aspect_rules_js//npm:npm_import.bzl", "npm_translate_lock")

npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    npmrc = "//:.npmrc",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
    verify_node_modules_ignored = "//:.bazelignore",
)

load("@npm//:repositories.bzl", "npm_repositories")

npm_repositories()
```


## What's Changed
* chore: update to Aspect CLI 5.2.0-rc0 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/42
* chore: update to Aspect CLI 5.2.1 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/43
* feat: add ESM support to `jasmine_test()` by @dgp1130 in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/41
* refactor: remove vendored jasmine versions, user must provider their own jasmine from their node_modules by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/44

## New Contributors
* @dgp1130 made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/pull/41

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/compare/v0.3.1...v0.4.0

name: v0.3.1
body:
WORKSPACE snippet:
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_jasmine",
    sha256 = "b3b2ff30ed222db653092d8280e0b62a4d54c5e65c598df09a0a1d7aae78fc8f",
    strip_prefix = "rules_jasmine-0.3.1",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/releases/download/v0.3.1/rules_jasmine-v0.3.1.tar.gz",
)

######################
# aspect_rules_jasmine setup #
######################
# Fetches the aspect_rules_jasmine dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.

load("@aspect_rules_jasmine//jasmine:dependencies.bzl", "rules_jasmine_dependencies")

# Fetch dependencies which users need as well
rules_jasmine_dependencies()

load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

nodejs_register_toolchains(
    name = "nodejs",
    node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION,
)

load("@aspect_rules_jasmine//jasmine:repositories.bzl", "jasmine_repositories")

jasmine_repositories(name = "jasmine")

load("@jasmine//:npm_repositories.bzl", jasmine_npm_repositories = "npm_repositories")

jasmine_npm_repositories()
```
